properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:40AM EST until February 13 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth
of an inch.

* WHERE...Carbon and Monroe.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and freezing rain amounts will be
more likely in elevations above 1000 feet. However, small
amounts remain possible down to valley floors.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY
